title: M1-Feature: Admin Authentication & Setup
body:
**Description:** Implement admin login with 2FA and profile setup.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Admin Login UI (React form, 2FA modal)
- [ ] Backend: Auth endpoints (JWT, user model, 2FA codes)

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Admin can log in securely.
- 2FA required for admin account access.
- Admin profile page accessible after login.

title: M1-Feature: Store Configuration Forms
body:
**Description:** Allow admin to set company details, VAT ID, invoice format, currencies.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Store Config UI
- [ ] Backend: Store Config Endpoints

**AC:** Admin can save and edit store details that apply globally.

title: M1-Feature: Payment & Shipping Integration
body:
**Description:** Integrate payment gateways (Stripe/PayPal) and shipping providers.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Payment Selection UI
- [ ] Backend: Payment Gateway & Shipping Provider Setup

**AC:** Admin can choose payment methods and shipping rules accessible at checkout.

title: M1-Feature: Roles & Permissions
body:
**Description:** Implement RBAC for admin users.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Role Management UI
- [ ] Backend: Role-based access control logic

**AC:** Different admin roles with restricted access to certain features.

title: M2-Feature: Product Creation & Editing
body:
**Description:** Admin can create/edit physical & digital products.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Product Form UI
- [ ] Backend: Product CRUD Endpoints

**AC:** Products can be listed, created, edited, and deleted.

title: M2-Feature: Digital Product File Uploads
body:
**Description:** Secure file uploads for digital products.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Digital Upload UI
- [ ] Backend: File Storage & Access Control

**AC:** Digital products securely stored and retrievable post-purchase.

title: M2-Feature: Inventory Tracking & Alerts
body:
**Description:** Track stock levels, alert admin when low.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Inventory Dashboard
- [ ] Backend: Inventory Update & Alert System

**AC:** Admin sees real-time inventory and receives low-stock notifications.

title: M2-Feature: Limited Edition Drops
body:
**Description:** Schedule limited product releases.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Limited Drop Countdown
- [ ] Backend: Release Scheduling & Stock Lock

**AC:** Limited items become available at specified times and sell out automatically.

title: M3-Feature: Order Management
body:
**Description:** Admin can view and update order statuses.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Order List & Detail Views
- [ ] Backend: Order Status Endpoints

**AC:** Admin can track all orders, change status, and handle refunds/returns.

title: M3-Feature: Invoice Generation (AT/DE/CH)
body:
**Description:** Auto-generate compliant invoices.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Invoice Preview UI
- [ ] Backend: Invoice Service & Compliance Checks

**AC:** Legally compliant invoices generated per order, downloadable by customers.

title: M3-Feature: Accounting Exports
body:
**Description:** Export invoices and orders to CSV/JSON.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Export Button & Modal
- [ ] Backend: Export Endpoints

**AC:** Admin can download data for accounting systems.

title: M4-Feature: Sales Analytics Dashboard
body:
**Description:** Show sales charts, top products.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Analytics Charts
- [ ] Backend: Analytics Aggregation Endpoints

**AC:** Admin sees visual charts, trends, top-selling products.

title: M4-Feature: Profit Calculation & Reporting
body:
**Description:** Show raw profit (revenue - cost).

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Profit Reports UI
- [ ] Backend: Profit Calculation Logic

**AC:** Admin sees profit data per product/order.

title: M5-Feature: Public Storefront & Browsing
body:
**Description:** Customers can browse products.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Catalog & Filtering UI
- [ ] Backend: Public Product Listing

**AC:** Products visible to all, searchable & filterable.

title: M5-Feature: Customer Accounts & Authentication
body:
**Description:** Customer registration, login, profile.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Registration & Profile Pages
- [ ] Backend: Customer Auth Endpoints

**AC:** Customers can create accounts, log in, manage profiles.

title: M6-Feature: Shopping Cart & Checkout Flow
body:
**Description:** Add to cart, checkout with shipping or pickup, handle payments.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Cart Page & Checkout Steps
- [ ] Backend: Cart & Order Creation Endpoints

**AC:** Customers can complete purchases end-to-end.

title: M6-Feature: Digital Delivery & Pickup Notifications
body:
**Description:** Immediate digital access post-purchase, pickup notifications.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Digital Download Links
- [ ] Backend: Digital Access Tokens & Pickup Alerts

**AC:** Digital products available instantly; customers notified when pickup orders ready.

title: M7-Feature: Order History & Invoices for Customers
body:
**Description:** Customers can view past orders, download invoices.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Order History Page
- [ ] Backend: Order Retrieval Endpoints

**AC:** Customers access order history and invoices anytime.

title: M7-Feature: Support & Returns
body:
**Description:** Customers can request returns, contact support.

**Tasks:**
- [ ] Frontend: Return Request Form, Support Contact
- [ ] Backend: Returns API

**AC:** Customers initiate returns and get support directly.
